0.0.1.name: wordpress/mingle-user-location
0.0.1.description:
Used with Mingle - Shows user with location and website. Image, username(clickable to profile), location, and website. Custom iTheme for iPhone Mingle Available at http://icomnow.com/mingle-live-status-feed for a very unbelievable price!

More Mingle Plugins at http://icomnow.com including the new Friend Suggestion Plugin and BIO HOVER! See Screen Shots http://wordpress.org/extend/plugins/mingle-live-status-feed/screenshots/

****GET MINGLE LIVE STATUS FEED PLUS**** Includes Your latest status and clear button, Your Friend Requests, and the Live Status Feed all in your sidebar...Wrap in awesome bubble styled converstaions! http://icomnow.com/plugin-store/
